summary: Test suite for the ASUSWRT device tracker integration, covering data collection from ARP, DHCP leases, and neighbor tables, parsing logic, authentication via SSH/Telnet, and device discovery including wake‑on‑LAN handling.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the ASUSWRT device tracker component in Home Assistant to ensure reliable network device tracking across different connection protocols and data sources.
